DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess surface cutaneous antimicrobial activity IV Clear™ Dressing , Tegaderm CHG™ Dressing Silicone Vehicle Control Dressing .
DOC.brief_title: Antimicrobial Activity IV Clear™ Dressing - Prevention Antimicrobial Regrowth
DOC.detailed_description: A single center , within-subject randomize study design healthy adult subject history high bacteria count upper back , meet inclusion criterion . Antimicrobial efficacy measure determine mean number Colony Forming Units ( CFUs ) per square centimetre ( cm² ) skin prior treatment ( baseline measurement ) , follow preparation 70 % isopropyl alcohol , follow post treatment sample . The goal study demonstrate IV Clear™ effective good Tegaderm™ CHG dress prevent regrowth cutaneous microbial flora test subject .
DOC.criteria: Are ≥ 18 year age ≤ 65 year age Are good health , evidence response demographics/dermatological medical history form Are willing refrain use antimicrobial soap bath shower entire study Are willing refrain swim chemically treat pool hot tub duration study Are willing refrain use antimicrobial/medicated lotion cream duration study , unless prescribe physician intercurrent illness Are willing refrain use topical systemic antibiotic medication duration study , unless prescribe physician intercurrent illness Are willing refrain use body powder fabric softener Are willing use soap shampoo antiperspirant/deodorant provide exclusively study Have qualification screen bacterial count ≥ 2.5 log10 CFU/cm² two contralateral site upper back Are willing comply study protocol requirement Subjects enrolled study : Are currently pregnant lactate Have expose topical systemic antimicrobial two week proceed treatment . This restriction include , limited shampoo , lotion , soap , body powder , material solvent , acid , alkali Have know soap , detergent , antibiotic and/or perfume allergy Have medically diagnose medical condition precludes participation , : diabetes , hepatitis , organ transplant , medical surgical implant immune compromise system Have medical condition opinion Investigator prelude participation Have swim chemically treated pool hot tubs two week prior microbial sampling Have use UV tan lamps two week prior microbial sample Have tattoo , dermatosis , abrasion , cut , lesion skin disorder test site Have bath shower less 48 hour prior microbial sample Have know sensitivity adhesive product , material use test article Have participate type back wash study within 7 day prior study Have know sensitivity latex product Are willing fulfill requirement protocol
